subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Of all the 18 other groups of brothers who have played major league baseball, only the three Molina brothers — Bengie, José and Yadier, all catchers — can each claim a World Series championship.
snippet: Of all the 18 other groups of brothers who have played major league baseball, only the three Molina brothers — Bengie, José and Yadier, all catchers — can each claim a World Series championship.
